text: Senior staffs are not treating their juniors with respect according to their job position. The senior staffs are very ignorant towards their juonior staff which is pretty ironic because they are in the social work centre. Please look into this matter and ensure everyone is treated equally.

Ms.Melissa is my social worker,she is very kind and very helpul person, she treat me and my son like a family..she help me for my son school and everything for my son welfare she is so soft spoken which i like the way she talk to me everytime and she's a good listener and good adviser also Thank you again Ms.Melissa i really really appreciate of what you've done for me and my son you are very supportive,keep up the good work!may 'Allah' bless you more and stay healthy ..
I love this place as it had helped me and my family go through terrible time and the people working there are amazingly friendly and nice to talk to.
